name: Temple Dilemma (Full Game)
description:
How far are you willing to go for just a little more ?... 

One day while looking through his vast collection of stuff, our little monkey friend was amazed at what suddenly appeared in the sky ... A golden banana, who's beauty and splender put to shame the greatest of gems in his collection. Now that he knew of its existance, there was no way he could do without it... He chased it through the jungle and followed it into a temple who's very entrance closed shut once he passed through...Our friend didn't mind however, nothing would come between him and his new found goal ; Even his very own freedom...

Buy CIB here:

https://www.oldschool-interactive.com/


See original kickstarter campaign here:

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/templedilemma/temple-dilemma?ref=user_menu


Download demo here:

https://weapon121.itch.io/temple-dilemma
***********************************************************************************
Controls:

Up/Down - Move on vines

B button - Attack

A button - Jump/swim

************************************************************************************

In order to play, a Mapper30 compatible emulator must be used (Messen for example)
Runs great on mister and Everdrive N8 pro.
